translations: 吉普赛人的；吉普赛语的；吉普赛人之风俗习惯的

sentences.sentence: Many Romanies do not even get that far.
sentences.translation: 许多吉普赛人甚至连面试的机会都没有。

sentences.sentence: America gives its Romanies that chance.
sentences.translation: 美国已经给吉普赛人这样的机会。

sentences.sentence: America gives its Romanies that chance. Europe has yet to do so.
sentences.translation: 美国给了吉普赛人这样的机会，而欧洲还没这么做。
